database.name: VIEW EFIN_BUDGETINQREV_V
database.view: SELECT revln.efin_budget_transfertrxline_id AS efin_budgetinqrev_v_id, revln.efin_budget_transfertrxline_id, rev.efin_budget_transfertrx_id, rev.ad_client_id, rev.ad_org_id, rev.isactive, rev.created, rev.createdby, rev.updated, rev.updatedby, rev.documentno, rev.doctype, rev.trxdate, rev.c_campaign_id, rev.description, rev.note, rev.docstatus, rev.processing, rev.processed, rev.reportdate, rev.reportnumber, rev.decisiondate, rev.decisionnumber, rev.add1, rev.add2, rev.add3, rev.add4, rev.c_year_id, rev.accounting_date, rev.transfer_source, rev.action, revln.unique_code, revln.increase, revln.decrease, revln.description AS linedesc, revln.created AS linecreated, revln.createdby AS linecreatedby, revln.efin_budgetlines_id, revln.c_validcombination_id, budgetinq.efin_budgetinquiry_id FROM efin_budget_transfertrxline revln JOIN efin_budget_transfertrx rev ON revln.efin_budget_transfertrx_id = rev.efin_budget_transfertrx_id JOIN efin_budgetinquiry budgetinq ON rev.efin_budgetint_id = budgetinq.efin_budgetint_id AND revln.c_validcombination_id = budgetinq.c_validcombination_id WHERE (rev.docstatus IN ('CO', 'WFA')) AND revln.c_validcombination_id IS NOT NULL
